name: Looping Leo
description:
Join Leo on his crazy journey to collect as many coins as possible and get the global high score. But be careful not to hit the air balloons or your flight will be be immediately over!

Just click and hold anywhere on the screen to loop Leo’s plane. But be careful - if you hit one of the air balloons you will crash immediately. If you happen to fly outside the play area - be sure to return quickly or your game will be over.

For keyboard controls, just press SPACE.

When you rage quit, post your high score in the comments section.
